mapper.select: SELECT rcp_img_s , rcp_name FROM ( select * from tb_recipe order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) Tb1 WHERE rownum <= 6

SELECT A.ingre_seq, B.ingre_name FROM tb_frigo A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ingre B on A.ingre_seq=B.ingre_seq WHERE A.mem_seq = #{mem_seq} and A.FRIGO_STORAGE = #{frigo_storage} and rownum <= 10 order by A.FRIGO_EXPIRATION

SELECT CASE WHEN f_cnt = 0 THEN '비움' WHEN e_cnt = 0 THEN '양호' WHEN e_cnt/f_cnt < 0.3 then '보통' ELSE '위험' END as f_status , f_cnt , e_cnt FROM (SELECT COUNT(frigo_seq) as f_cnt , COUNT(case when frigo_expiration < sysdate then 1 end) as e_cnt FROM tb_frigo Where mem_seq =#{mem_seq} )
